ttbar sliced in TruthMET

Dec 6, 2017

Purpose

SUSY will have filtered ttbar samples with TruthMET> 200 GeV –> Is it worth to propose a slicing for TruthMET < 200 ? )

Raw numbers of events and yields per slice

  • a very basic slicing strategy might be : | Category | Slice | | ——– | —– | | Low | TruthMET < 100 GeV | | Medium | 100 GeV < TruthMET < 200 GeV | | High | TruthMET > 200 GeV |

2 jets 2 tags (MVA selection)

Slice NEvents Yield
Low 87 26.59
Medium 1280 386.61
High 190 62.90
All 1557 476.1

3 jets 2 tags (MVA selection)

| Slice | NEvents | Yield | | —— | ——- | ——- | | Low | 550 | 165.79 | | Medium | 8909 | 2643.49 | | High | 1967 | 591.26 | | All | 11426 | 3400.54 | )
